examples.name: AWS VPC Example
examples.description: Basic AWS VPC and subnet configuration

examples.name: Kubernetes Deployment Example
Terraform Module Example
examples.content:
module "vpc" {
  source = "terraform-aws-modules/vpc/aws"
  version = "3.0.0"

  name = "my-vpc"
  cidr = "10.0.0.0/16"

  azs             = ["us-west-2a", "us-west-2b", "us-west-2c"]
  private_subnets = ["10.0.1.0/24", "10.0.2.0/24", "10.0.3.0/24"]
  public_subnets  = ["10.0.101.0/24", "10.0.102.0/24", "10.0.103.0/24"]

  enable_nat_gateway = true
  single_nat_gateway = true
}
examples.description: Using Terraform modules for VPC creation
